DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , randomize , single-blinded human clinical trial examine injection pressure influence spread give volume injectate adductor canal , adductor canal nerve block .
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , randomize , single-blinded human clinical trial examine injection pressure influence spread give volume injectate adductor canal , adductor canal nerve block . The study population patient undergo elective anterior cruciate ligament repair distal low extremity receive preoperative adductor canal nerve block postoperative analgesia . They randomize two group 25 patient . The investigator speculate high injection pressure ( > 20 psi ) lead great spread local anesthetic low injection pressure ( < 15 psi ) mid-thigh adductor canal nerve block . The primary endpoint spread injectate , define distance uppermost lowermost limit spread local anesthetic assess ultrasound . The secondary endpoint incidence femoral sciatic nerve block 30 minute block placement , amount IV opioid administer intraoperatively postoperatively , preoperative postoperative pain ( Numeric Rating Scale , 0-10 ) , postoperative physical therapy milestone achievement .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Planned general anesthetic . 2 . American Society Anesthesia class I , II , III . 3 . Patients aged 1865 . 4 . Englishspeaking patient . Exclusion criterion : 1 . ASA class IV V. 2 . Patients young 18 old 65 . 3 . Contraindication regional anesthesia ( coagulopathy , patient refusal ) . 4 . Allergy local anesthetic study medication . 5 . BMI > 35 kg/m2 . 6 . Chronic opioid use ( daily almost daily use > 3 month ) . 7 . Active illicit drug use . 8 . Additional surgical site limb adductor canal block . 9 . Pregnancy . 10 . Preexisting neuropathy operative limb . 11 . Inability communicate investigator hospital staff . 12 . Inability speak understand English .
